headline: Lou Dobbs Backs Gaetz, Jordan Over McCarthy as Speaker if GOP Takes House
author: Jason Lemon
sentences: Right-wing political commentator Lou Dobbs expressed his hope that Representative Jim Jordan of Ohio or Representative Matt Gaetz of Florida—both Republicans—could become House Speaker if the GOP retakes control of Congress' lower chamber in the upcoming midterm elections.
